title: Rider of Rohan (4C286)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	5
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	Skirmish: If this companion is mounted, exert him to exert a minion skirmishing an unbound companion.
Lore:	”'They are proud and wilful, but they are true-hearted, generous in thought and deed….'”
Rarity:	C
